name: Deathwish (Crewless Studio)
description:
Controls:

  • W,A,S,D - movement
  • J - attack

every time u die u can choose one of 3 wish. the more u die the more difficult the enemy becomes.

Note:

  • quit the game if no enemy comes more than 5 sec
  • This is a very early proto so , there are lot of bugs to fix .Due to lack of time i didnt made much progress in case you have like idea or having any  suggestions let me know in comments..

thank you!
